FuncDef:
The multicast wtr command sets a switchback wait time for multicast VPN FRR.
The undo multicast wtr command restores the default switchback wait time.
The default switchback wait time is 600s for multicast VPN FRR.
ParentView: VPN instance IPv4 address family MVPN view

ParaDef.Info:
Sets a switchback wait time for multicast VPN FRR.
The value is an integer ranging from 60 to 1800, in seconds.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the primary link recovers in an NG MVPN 1+1 scenario, the system waits for a period of time before switching traffic back to the primary link. To set a switchback wait time, run the multicast wtr command. If a network has a large number of multicast entries (for example, 1000 or more), setting the switchback wait time to a value greater than 600s is recommended.
Prerequisites
Multicast VPN FRR has been enabled using the c-multicast frr command in the VPN instance IPv4 address family MVPN view.
